# Quarto Version Note {.unnumbered .unlisted}

This manuscript is a modernized re-edition of John Forbes Nash Jr.'s thesis, authored using [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and based in part on the LaTeX code by [Simon Xiang](https://github.com/simonxiang1/nash_thesis). This version is available for free download from my [GitHub repository](https://github.com/luifrancgom/non-cooperative_games_nash). For more information, check out the `README.md` file in this repository.
